nodes.text: Anvil Leader was the callsign assigned to the leader of the New Republic's Anvil Squadron. During the Galactic Civil War, a pilot using this callsign led defense forces against an Imperial assault above Mon Cala and then later participated in a battle in the Ringali Nebula, to protect the heavily damaged Starhawk from a final strike by Titan Squadron.
Anvil Leader was the callsign of a Rebel Alliance non-player character in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons.
